name: EJB Entity access through their local Interface
description: Since EJB 2.0, EJB Entities should be accessed through their local  Interface instead of their remote Interface. This avoids the need for the JNDI lookup, which improves the performance.
output:
This report lists all the Methods using the EJB Entity remote Interfaces.
It provides the following information:
 - Method full name
 - Entity Java Bean Name
total: Number of Methods accessing Java EJB Entity

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
